name: danmakuDUCKS
description:
A Duck Hell and Bullet Hell Action Platformer!

You're a DUCK who shoots DUCKS at other DUCKS who also shoot DUCKS at your DUCK! Stop the ADUCKOLYPSE, Try the Tutorial if you get SDUCK!

This game is much larger than my previous projects so I strongly appreciate you donating to the game. However if you don't have money you can play it for FREE!

Features:

  • 5 Challenging and Unique Stages
  • Beautiful Hand-drawn Pixel Art and Animation
  • DUCK CREATOR! Choose from 100 items to customise your appearance.
  • 80+ Unique Boss and Enemy Bullet Patterns
  • 5 Difficulty Levels for Pros and Noobs alike
  • It's fun!

BUY GAME: https://dynostorm.itch.io/danmakuducks

BUY SOUNDTRACK: https://dynostorm.bandcamp.com/album/danmakuducks-ost

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

Arrows to Run, X to Jump in Platform Mode. Press and Hold Z to enter Shooting Mode.
Arrows to Fly, X to Flip in Shooting Mode. Release Z to return to Platform Mode.
Press C to Bomb or Counter-Bomb (Save yourself).
Keep your HITS counter UP, don't die, HAVE FUN!
and come back here if you get Sduck! ;)

HOW TO PLAY:


NEED HELP?
